constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 1 (Approved Plans), Condition 2 (Expiry Date), Condition 3 (Cycle Parking), Condition 4 (Refuse Storage and Recycling Facilities), Condition 5 (Construction Phase Development and Deliveries), Condition 6 (Nature Conservation), Condition 7 (Landscaping Scheme), Condition 8 (No Permission for First Floor Terrace), Condition 9 (Materials), Condition 10 (Changes to Fenestration)  of planning permission 21/04008/FUL (Conversion of ground floor commercial space into 2no. self-contained residential units with associated amenity space, cycle parking and refuse/recycling facilities)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted a 'conditions site plan' which is different from that originally approved under the parent permission (reference 21/04008/FUL) and alters the internal layout to 2x flats from that originally approved. Whilst condition 1 is a compliance condition, officers nonetheless do not accept the submitted conditions site plan.
Insufficient details have been provided for Condition 6 (Nature Conservation) and therefore the condition cannot be discharged.

The submitted scheme with information about proposed plants is insufficient in its level of detail.  It therefore does not satisfy the requirements of Condition 7 and, as such, this condition cannot be discharged.
